description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	To write software programs from design specifications that are in compliance with established coding quality standard of the company.
              
              -	Perform the code review, code refactor if required
              
              -	To be trained or self-train on new technologies.
              
              -	Plans, executes and document unit/integration tests
              
              -	Encourage to contribute the ideas for system architecture and design decisions.
              
              -	Join in all required phases from planning, estimation, designing, developing the implementation, testing, and deployment to maintenance.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Highly skilled at front-end engineering using Object-Oriented JavaScript
              
              -	Experienced in one of frameworks: Angular, React, Ember, ExtJS
              
              -	Proficient in code review, code refactoring, Unit Testing
              
              -	Experience working in an Agile Software Development environment
              
              -	Prefer for additional skills:
              
              o	Good knowledge back-end technologies
              
              o	HTML5 & CSS3 new features
              
              o	D3.js
              
              o	Node.js
              
              o	TDD / BDD
              
              o	Build script with Grunt
              
              o	ReactJS
              
              o	Redux / Redux Sagas
              
              o	React Native
              
              o	Rendering react components server side
              
              o	Web pack / babel
              
              o	Unit testing using jest and snapshots
              
              o	Automated user testing of web site
              
              o	Familiar with common react patterns
              
              o	API design tools such as swagger hub and apiary
              
              o	Common web security patterns
              
              o	react native offline patterns
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
